title: How a noted Bihar doctor lost over Rs 4 crore in cyber fraud
snippet: Dr Abhay Narayan, a prominent heart surgeon from Bihar's Gaya district, found himself ensnared in a cyberfraud of chilling sophistication. The crime, marked by manipulation and fear, resulted in the loss of a staggering Rs 4.4 crore—a sum carefully siphoned away through a web of lies and intimidation.
